mapper.sql: id, semester_id, recess_time, siesta_time, create_time, semester_name, school_id
mapper.select:
select sc.id, sc.semester_id, sc.recess_time, sc.siesta_time, sc.create_time, sc.semester_name, sc.school_id, s.name school_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) from edu_schedule_details where schedule_id = sc.id) as countLesson
from
as sc INNER JOIN edu_school s ON sc.school_id = s.id where 1=1 and sc.school_id in
'${item}'
and ( sc.semester_name LIKE ('%'+#{pd.keywords}+'%') or s.name LIKE ('%'+#{pd.keywords}+'%') )

select sc.id, sc.semester_id, sc.recess_time, sc.siesta_time, sc.create_time, sc.semester_name, sc.school_id, s.name school_name
from
as sc INNER JOIN edu_school s ON sc.school_id = s.id where 1=1 and sc.school_id in
'${item}'

SELECT id,name from edu_semester where s_id in
#{sid}

SELECT sd.schedule_id, sd.grades_id, sd.classroom_id, sd.week, sd.period, sd.start_time, sd.end_time, sd.id, c.classroom_name, g.name grades_name, g.teacher_name, g.tuition, g.class_time
FROM dbo.edu_schedule_details AS sd INNER JOIN dbo.edu_grades AS g ON sd.grades_id = g.id INNER JOIN dbo.edu_classroom AS c ON sd.classroom_id = c.id
where sd.schedule_id = #{id}
order BY sd.start_time

SELECT p.grade_id, p.id, p.xq_id, p.ks, p.mz_ks, p.xk_zs, p.wk_yj, g.name grades_name, (SELECT COUNT(d.id) from edu_schedule_details d INNER JOIN edu_schedule s ON s.id=d.schedule_id where d.grades_id = p.grade_id and s.semester_id=p.xq_id) as ypks
FROM dbo.edu_teach_plan AS p INNER JOIN dbo.edu_grades AS g ON g.id = p.grade_id
where g.id = #{grades_id} and p.xq_id = #{semester_id} and p.sh_type = '2'

SELECT sd.schedule_id, sd.grades_id, sd.classroom_id, sd.week, sd.period, sd.start_time, sd.end_time, sd.id, c.classroom_name, g.name grades_name, g.teacher_name, g.tuition, g.class_time
FROM dbo.edu_schedule_details AS sd INNER JOIN dbo.edu_grades AS g ON sd.grades_id = g.id INNER JOIN dbo.edu_classroom AS c ON sd.classroom_id = c.id
where sd.schedule_id = #{id} and sd.grades_id = #{grades_id}
order BY sd.start_time

select esd.grades_id, esd.week, esd.start_time, esd.end_time from edu_schedule es INNER JOIN edu_schedule_details esd ON (es.id = esd.schedule_id) where es.semester_id = #{semester_id} and esd.grades_id in
#{gId}
mapper.insert: insert into edu_schedule_details ( id, schedule_id, grades_id, classroom_id, week, period, start_time, end_time ) values ( #{id}, #{schedule_id}, #{grades_id}, #{classroom_id}, #{week}, #{period}, #{start_time}, #{end_time} )
